item.title: Add Qtile icon in LightDM slick-greeter
item.description: This is how to a Qtile icon to LightDM slick-greeter. By default it displays a stupid circle. Download the icon: Rename it to qtile.png Place it in /usr/share/slick-greeter/badges/
item.content:encoded:
This is how to a Qtile icon to LightDM slick-greeter. By default it displays a stupid circle.

  1. Download the icon:
  2. Rename it to qtile.png
  3. Place it in /usr/share/slick-greeter/badges/
